name: The Hooter Commuter
description:
Controls: Space Bar or Left Mouse click to Hoot.

Welcome to "The Hooter Commuter" the addictive game where you get to be a nose! Tap the screen to clear your nostrils and guide your nose through a series of obstacles.

Your goal is to navigate your nose through a series of buildings without touching them. But beware, the buildings are placed at varying heights, so you'll need to time your blows just right to avoid a collision.
